TITLE: Jim Cramer was not selling stocks in Tuesday's wreckage. Here is why he stood firm
SUMMARY: "I'm not saying you need to buy something here yet," the "Mad Money" host said. However, August's CPI report doesn't change his view on the Fed and the economy.
